alert.note: Alert for Madison; Southern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 06 at 9:51PM EST until January 07 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches, bringing storm totals of 6 to 10 inches. * WHERE...Madison and Southern Oneida counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There may be a brief lull in the steadier snow after midnight, before more moderate snow develops Sunday morning and into Sunday afternoon over the area.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
